backgroundInformationList.description: Declaration of Surplus Property - 575 Van Horne Avenue

noticeDescription:
Notice

 

NOTICE is hereby given that City Council, at its meeting held on February 5, 2025, declared surplus to the Toronto Public Library Board’s purposes, part of the property municipally known as 575 Van Horne Avenue, legally described as Part of Block D, Plan M-1269, designated as Part 1 on Plan 66R-34190, being part of PIN 10045-0042 (LT). Part 1 on Plan 66R-34190 has a total area of approximately 32.6 m2 (350.90 ft2). It is proposed that Part 1 on Plan 66R-34190 be conveyed to City of Toronto for municipal purposes.

 

The following Toronto Public Library official has information about the proposed disposition: Ms. Shirley Lee, Senior Manager, Facilities Capital Project, Tel: 437-860-8908, 789 Yonge Street, Toronto, Ontario M4W 2G8. Enquiries may be made of the said official until April 14, 2025.
title: Declaration of Surplus Property - 575 Van Horne Avenue
topics: Sale of City Property/Real Estate > Proposed sale of City property
